title: Duck and noodles in a green coconut curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '4 duck legs', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 fresh chillies, finely chopped to taste', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '850ml coconut milk', '3 tablespoons green curry paste or to taste', '2 kaffir lime leaves (optional)', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons Thai fish sauce', '350g dried rice noodles', '1/2 bunch coriander']
